title: Starknet Remix Plugin
description: A workspace for Starknet developers to write, compile, and deploy Cairo code

title: Starkfees
description: A tool to learn how much you have spent in gas with Starknet

title: Supabase SWR utils
description: SWR wrapper, serverside fetcher and utils for Supabase, typescript set of packages as a monorepo with Lerna.

title: Swarm uploader of wikipedia pages
description: Winner of Swarm and FairDataSociety hackathon bounty competition: a docker-compose that handles setting up a Swarm node, an express API and Next application in order to handle zim files and upload them to the Swarm network

title: This website
description: Built with Next.js and TailwindCSS, integrated with two other projects listed here.

title: Starknet Costa Rica meetup
description: A space to chat about Starknet and Cairo, and to learn about the technology and its applications
